title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies in Practice: Textbook Analysis Strategies for Enhancing Internal Consistency in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics theory, basic understanding of elementary curriculum components, and textbook analysis methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more domestic and international elementary mathematics textbooks and evaluate their internal consistency indicators.
Learners can explain three or more textbook design principles that strengthen the interconnectedness of mathematical concepts.
Based on analysis results, learners can propose instructional design plans to improve internal consistency in mathematics education.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
